title: cleanmixer
author: cleanmixer
content: CleanMixer.app : The OpenSource & Law Abiding Crypto Mixer for Normal People.https://cleanmixer.appWhite Paper: https://cleanmixer.app/5364a3545c9bb3c32087ab363e8a8d21.pdf GitBook: https://cleanmixer-app.gitbook.io/cleanmixer.app  Twitter: https://twitter.com/cleanmixer_app  Summary: CleanMixer.app is an opensource multichain crypto mixer. It offers open source and secure and anonymous transactions using state-of-the-art ZKSnarks technology.Unlike some other mixers on the market, CleanMixer.app takes a proactive approach to ensure that it is operating within the legal framework by allowing law enforcers to ban certain wallets by paying a fee. CleanMixer.app does not track any user data or save any data and decentralized. In the roadmap, we will be allowing anyone to copy the opensource code and create multiple mirror sites that will be governed and vetted by the community. How to use. 1. Deposit set amount: Select blockchain on the top navbar (default is ethereum). Click the Deposit button after selecting a certain amount of crypto. Copy the note and download to a safe place https://3907432380-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2Fr7tZGCdqvHK97ak3pFxk%2Fuploads%2FaKK9o1MhbB5LYnomOcuM%2Fselect-blockchain.png?alt=media&token=ecae7b5f-c401-41e2-bc1a-282bacf136a32.Click the withdraw tab to withdraw when ready to send to a fresh wallet. Paste the Note we saved earlier to the right input box, then with a fresh new wallet address (in any crypto wallet of your choosing or an address you with to send privately), copy and past to the receiver's wallet address. https://3907432380-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2Fr7tZGCdqvHK97ak3pFxk%2Fuploads%2FvzptwZmbQp7RqVb9W8mX%2Fwidthdraw.png?alt=media&token=a2967a98-89dd-44eb-afec-4030842591bcCleanMixer.app is a cutting-edge opensource crypto mixer that prioritizes compliance with laws and regulations. Unlike some other mixers on the market, CleanMixer.app takes a proactive approach to ensure that it is operating within the legal framework.One key feature of CleanMixer.app is its ability to automatically detect and block wallets that are on the Treasury Department's sanctions list. This ensures that the platform is not being used for illicit activities and that it is not facilitating transactions with individuals or entities that are on the wrong side of the law.In addition, CleanMixer.app also allows law enforcement agencies to request the blocking of certain users and wallets. This ensures that the platform is not being used for illegal activities and that it is cooperating with authorities in their efforts to combat crime.The platform also uses state-of-the-art technology to ensure that transactions are secure and anonymous. This includes the use of multiple layers of encryption, as well as a complex mixing algorithm that ensures that transactions cannot be traced back to their original source.Overall, CleanMixer.app is a reliable and secure crypto mixer that prioritizes compliance with laws and regulations. This makes it an ideal choice for individuals and businesses looking to use the platform for legitimate purposes. Tokenomics and Token Launch Date: Coming soon on Twitter: https://twitter.com/cleanmixer_app

comments.author: NFTmetria
comments.body: Your site immediately tries to get permission from the metamask when it loads. Even without connection initialization. This is either a bug in the code or malicious intent. Doesn't look very safe.

comments.author: cleanmixer
comments.body: Thank you for the feedback NFTmetria , I will try fix that bug by Feb 14th and only allow access to wallet once user clicks the button. I'll probably use wallet connect to allow user to connect any wallet they want.Also Goerli testnet is available so they can use that testnet to see if the mixer is working for free.Also try a small amount first on Polygon Network for little as $0.01 USD amount of Matic . We focus on small amounts so there will be no money laundry or illegal activities on the mixer. Our focus is LEGAL privacy only . And we fully cooperate with law-enforcement if there is a Warrant by a judge. First 1000 Wallets that deposit will receive Airdrops in the near future. Quote from: NFTmetria on February 01, 2023, 01:40:01 AMYour site immediately tries to get permission from the metamask when it loads. Even without connection initialization. This is either a bug in the code or malicious intent. Doesn't look very safe.

comments.author: cleanmixer
comments.body: We just fixed the BUG! Sorry for late updates, it is really hard to run a hobby project with a full time dev job in at a tech company.We fixed the bug for wallet automatically asking for metamask permission. Now we are only connecting wallet when clicking the "connect wallet" button and added a new feature to use wallet connect instead as well.Please check our twitter image below: https://twitter.com/cleanmixer_app/status/1629702147888779264/photo/1 Quote from: NFTmetria on February 01, 2023, 01:40:01 AMYour site immediately tries to get permission from the metamask when it loads. Even without connection initialization. This is either a bug in the code or malicious intent. Doesn't look very safe.
